title: NamomoCamp-day1-dp
content: Solution for NamomoCamp2021-div2-day1-dp New Year and Original Order (Good Bye 2017 G) Tag 数位dp Solution Code Financiers Game (CF 729 F) Tag dp, 状态优化 Solution 先来想一个暴力的状态，F[i][j][k][m] 表示左边取 i ，右边取 j，上一步取了 k，m=0/1 表示轮到左/右边取，F[i][j][k][m] 则表示该状态下的答案，即 sum[左]-sum[右] 状态显然，转移显然 $aa$ $a_i$ Code [ZJOI2012]波浪 Tag Solution Code Game on Chessboard (CCPC 2019 秦皇岛 G) Tag Solution Code Fountains (ICPC 2020 上海 F) Tag Solution Code Sum (VK Cup 2019 Final D) Tag Solution Code Lucky Numbers (CF 1428 G) Tag Solution Code String Transformation (CF 1383 C) Tag Solution Code Cells Blocking (300iq contest) Tag Solution Code
